channel.title: How to make my Client Downloadable?
channel.description:
I'd like to know how to put the client of my RSPS on my website so people can play on the Client. (as webclient dont work and no one want to do it for me....) -_-
I heard that i got to declare something in my Client.java (into sources) and something in singlink.java (into client)
